website_summaries.verdict: Snuggle up your newborn in this chic and modern New Zealand pine wood cradle. Rock your baby to sleep or use the stabilizers to keep the cradle in place.
pros: Hidden stabilizing bars add extra support and stability
Spacious interior and smooth rocking motion
Cradle is easy to assemble and will be a beautiful addition to your nursery
cons: This cradle is bulkier than other options

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Much bigger than expected which is great! It rocks nicely but can be locked too. The only reason I gave it 3 stars was because the paint chipped off in several spots and I had to touch it up before I ever used it. I had trouble matching the color exactly so now I can see my touch up marks.
customer_reviews.author: P. VanDuyn

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love the cradle, perfect size and the baby loves gently rocking
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A

customer_reviews.title: Lovely rocking cradle
customer_reviews.text: The cradle is lovely with a nice gentle rock which can be made stationary with stoppers. I've given it 4 stars as there are a couple of places where paint has been chipped off on the cradle and the mattress is really poor quality. It is very light and flimsy and crumpled under the tension of a fitted sheet. The mattress in the picture is a Colgate cradle mattress that I had to purchase separately.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah-Ann Wiejak

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: We didn’t use it yet..but so far we love it..looks so beautiful and well made..I can’t wait for our little guy to be here so he can enjoy it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mattress too thin
customer_reviews.text: The Cradle is amazing: good quality, stable, cute, easy to assemble. But please be advised the mattress that is included is only 1 inch thick. This is by far not enough for an infant. I have to order an extra mattress to compensate for it.
customer_reviews.author: Le

customer_reviews.title: Love this cradle!
customer_reviews.text: Company had great customer service. Love the simple design of this cradle. It's also bigger/more spacious that I thought it would be
customer_reviews.author: Reese

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: All in all satisfied. Easy assy instructions. Was as advertised. Overpriced in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: KWatts60

customer_reviews.title: Great cradle
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful cradle. We haven’t used the rocking feature as our son scares when we use it. The only issue I find with it is that it is difficult to find sheets that fit the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda E Russell

customer_reviews.title: we are extremely happy with it
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the Green a Frog cradle for our grandchild, we are extremely happy with it. The cradle was very easy to put together, very sturdy and color was exactly as the picture. I would definitely purchase more furniture from Green Frog!!!
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with this cradle. Thank you. Prompt service and well described by the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and size of this cradle/bassinet! My husband put it together and it is beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Lillie Reyes

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: it work for my office space ...my baby love to rock it ...great choice looks great too
customer_reviews.author: lecia

customer_reviews.title: Do not BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: There are chips that were colored in, dents, and areas that were not painted. The lacquer is separating from the wood!!
customer_reviews.author: Chon

customer_reviews.title: No regrets😊
customer_reviews.text: Super simple to set up 👍 Beautiful for the price on sale plus this item is available for prime I recieved 40 % off item plus my 15% with my baby registry and prime membership 💗 Im happy the size is just right in all dimensions no defective parts & the mattress is really thin but Im okay with because that's important for babys safety & development 💗
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Onofre

product_meta.title: Green Frog, Allegro Cradle | Handcrafted Contemporary Wood Baby Cradle | Premium Pine Construction | Rocking and Stationary | Modern Grey Color
feature_bullets: The Green Frog, Allegro Cradle offers a modern design with straight lines, solid side panels and an x cross base for easy rocking
Includes all Tools for easy assembly
Measures 39" L x 21" W x 35" H

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars25 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
